metadata.title: TOMS - Womens Majorca Block Sandals
description: With every pair of shoes you purchase, TOMS® will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need. One for One®.
With every pair of shoes you purchase, TOMS® will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need. One for One®.

Inspired by the Spanish Mediterranean, The TOMS® Majorca Block sandals boast a bold block heel with a luxurious sandal design that makes it perfect for evenings out, strolling through your favorite city, or enjoying a resort vacation.

Inspired by the Spanish Mediterranean, The TOMS® Majorca Block sandals boast a bold block heel with a luxurious sandal design that makes it perfect for evenings out, strolling through your favorite city, or enjoying a resort vacation.
High-heel sandals made of a rich suede leather.
High-heel sandals made of a rich suede leather.
Inside medial ankle-cuff zipper for easy on-and-off
Inside medial ankle-cuff zipper for easy on-and-off
Soft leather lining for a comfortable fit.
Soft leather lining for a comfortable fit.
Cushioned OrthoLite® Eco X40 insole proivdes high-rebound, long-term cushioning and is made with plant-derived and recycled materials.
Cushioned OrthoLite® Eco X40 insole proivdes high-rebound, long-term cushioning and is made with plant-derived and recycled materials.
Leather welt and wrapped heel.
Leather welt and wrapped heel.
Durable synthetic outsole.
